content:
The Ukrainian intelligence service continues to recruit the GUR MOU active action units. These are the forces that can make the most bold plans.

About thisReportsPress service of military intelligence.

In the General Directorate of Intelligence, ask a few questions to the candidates for recruitment to the units of active action:

  • Do you still have a service in defense?
  • But do you want the victory of Ukraine?
  • Do you have a good physical shape?
  • Determined and ready to perform complex but interesting tasks?
  • Do you not have relatives in Russia or temporarily occupied territories?

If opposite all these items you put a “plus” - thenFill out the application formTo participate in the selection course in the units of active actions of GUR MO!

“Do you want to do more to win with us? Became "Plus"! Let the enemies roar! ” - the military emphasized.

Earlier the Armyinformreportedwho has published the interception in which civilian Russians discuss the evacuation of the border areas of the Belgorod region and the continuation of mobilization measures.
title: Recruitment to the Units of Active Operations of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defence of Ukraine continues: Let the enemies rumble
description: This was reported by the press service of military intelligence. In the General Directorate of Intelligence ...
author: Army Inform
